New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns and Josh Hart achieved a rare 20/20 game together, a milestone not seen since Willis Reed and Clyde Frazier in the 1970s
Key Match Events: Mikal Bridges scored 27 points on 71% shooting
Cameron Payne contributed with eight points, nine assists, and three steals
Pre-Game Insights: Jalen Brunson was out, leading to Miles McBride starting, but Cameron Payne took over due to hamstring tightness
Post-Match Reflections: Tom Thibodeau praised Tyler Kolek's ability to play two games in one day, highlighting his dedication and potential
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks are on a nine-game winning streak and face a challenging matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder next
